azurerm_netapp_pool.description: Manages a Pool within a NetApp Account.

name.description: The name of the NetApp Pool. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group where the NetApp Pool should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

account_name.description: The name of the NetApp account in which the NetApp Pool should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

service_level.description: The service level of the file system. Valid values include `Premium`, `Standard`, or `Ultra`.

size_in_tb.description: Provisioned size of the pool in TB. Value must be between `4` and `500`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the NetApp Pool.

create.description: Used when creating the NetApp Pool.

update.description: Used when updating the NetApp Pool.

read.description: Used when retrieving the NetApp Pool.

delete.description: Used when deleting the NetApp Pool.
